item.description: Traffic Collision; INC#1413; 07:32PM; 4501 W Coliseum St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3CVl0Qu; #BaldwinHills / #Crenshaw; PRELIM: Solo vehicle into laundromat (no details). No injuries reported. LA Department of Building & Safety Inspector en route to assess structural integrity. Media Inquiries: LAPD South Traffic Division (Incident #3656); FS 94; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; E94 RA826; CH4; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Grass Fire; INC#1364; 07:30PM; 5600 N Fulton Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3L3hfez; #ValleyGlen; Despite wind gusts nearing 20 mph, 39 LAFD Firefighters took just 41 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish multiple areas of burning vegetation and debris near the Metro 'G' (Orange) Line Busway. No injury. Minor fence damage. No homes damaged. #LATraffic: The Metro G Line will remain closed in the immediate area of the fire until LAFD overhaul operations are complete, unknown duration. Transit Users: Follow @MetroLAAlerts https://twitter.com/MetroLAAlerts on Twitter for any G Line service related information.; FS 102; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E102 E109 E239 E288 E39 E60 E88 T39 T88 WT88; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

Rubbish Fire; INC#1364; 06:49PM; 5600 N Fulton Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3L3hfez; #ValleyGlen; PRELIM: Multiple areas of vegetation and debris burning near the Metro 'G' (Orange) Line Busway being fanned by 20 mph winds from the north. No imminent structure threat. #LATraffic: Firefighters are closing the Metro G Line in the area of the fire until LAFD operations are complete, unknown duration. Transit Users: Follow @MetroLAAlerts https://twitter.com/MetroLAAlerts on Twitter for any G Line service related information.; FS 102; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E102 E109 E239 E39 E60 E88 T39; CH8; Brian Humphrey

Update Traffic Collision; INC#1170; 05:08PM; 18300 W Sherman Wy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3IkMU9T; #Reseda; Additional persons have come forward at the scene, and there are now a total of 6 patients: 3 critical condition, 2 fair condition, 1 minor injury (likely to decline transport). LADWP en route (unknown ETA) to manage toppled utility/light pole. No further details. Media Inquiries: LAPD Valley Traffic Division (Incident #2887); FS 73; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E100 E103 E273 E290 E73 EM14 EM17 HR3 RA100 RA104 RA107 RA70 RA90 T90 UR88; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

Update Traffic Collision; INC#1170; 04:50PM; 18300 W Sherman Wy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3IkMU9T; #Reseda; Now described as 4 patients total, 3 of whom are critically injured. Unknown age / gender / affiliation / circumstances. No entrapment. Media Inquiries: LAPD Valley Traffic Division (Incident #2887); FS 73; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E100 E103 E273 E290 E73 EM14 EM17 HR3 RA100 RA104 RA70 RA90 T90 UR88; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

Traffic Collision; INC#1170; 04:41PM; 18300 W Sherman Wy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3IkMU9T; #Reseda; 4 critical patients. No entrapment.; FS 73; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E100 E103 E273 E290 E73 EM17 HR3 RA100 RA104 T90 UR88; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1750; 11:44PM; 5510 E York Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Io0Sb2; Highland Park; KNOCKDOWN: Updated to a large shed that was exposing several other structures. 40 firefighters extinguished the fire in 21 minutes with no injuries reported. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 55; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC2 E11 E12 E212 E220 E250 E42 RA12 RA55 T12 T20 T50; CH9; 16; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1750; 11:44PM; 5510 E York Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Io0Sb2; Highland Park; One story, single family dwelling with heavy fire showing. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 55; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC2 E11 E12 E212 E220 E250 E42 RA12 RA55 T12 T20 T50; CH9; 16; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1582; 10:27PM; 1825 S Main St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3uaPytx; Downtown; KNOCKDOWN: Over 50 firefighters extinguished the fire in 36 minutes. The building is a mixed one and two story structure which has previously burned. Firefighters were in the defensive mode and knocked down the fire with no injuries reported. No further details.; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC13 BC5 CM22 E10 E13 E14 E203 E209 E210 E211 E215 E266 E3 E9 EM11 HR3 RA10 RA3 RA810 SQ21 T10 T11 T15 T3 T66 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1582; 09:51PM; 1825 S Main St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3uaPytx; Downtown; Two story (vacant site of previous burn) medical building with fire showing through the roof. The incident is in the defensive mode.; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 E10 E209 E210 E9 RA10 RA810 SQ21 T10 T9; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart
